When selecting any of the objects on the left panel of Quest, it occurs to me that a tab could be added to change the view to code for just that object so when wanting to overhaul, say, the attributes or any part really, it would be so much simpler than scrolling through a ton of code in the entire game for each item to try and find it. 

Just a thought...
